hero.subtitle: Open-source CLI that transforms blueprints into production-ready code. Start with battle-tested modules, customize as needed, deploy anywhere.
hero.prompt: A collaborative project management app with JWT auth and a modern design system

subtitle.line1: You're Paying a Tax on Innovation.

solution.title: The Architech CLI eliminates the setup tax
solution.description: By providing a standardized, high-quality foundation that scales with your vision.

chart.innovationTaxDesc: Meetings, configuration, debugging, technical debt, and non-feature work that drains productivity.
chart.actualCodingDesc: Pure feature development and creative problem-solving - the work that truly matters.

timeConsuming.title: The Debt of Day One
timeConsuming.description: Of a developer's time is lost dealing with technical debt, often caused by poor initial architecture and rushed setup decisions.
timeConsuming.impact: Average development time reduced from 6 months to 2 weeks

complexSetup.title: The Illusion of AI Assistance
complexSetup.description: More time is spent debugging and refactoring when using AI code generators without a proper framework and architectural foundation.
complexSetup.impact: Zero technical setup required - everything is generated automatically

scalingChallenges.title: The Chaos of Configuration
scalingChallenges.description: This is the average time spent on project setup, configuration, and boilerplate before writing a single unique feature.
scalingChallenges.impact: Built-in scalability and automated maintenance from day one

instantGeneration.title: Deploy More Frequently
instantGeneration.description: Our modular architecture aligns with best practices that have proven to double or triple deployment velocity.

fullStackReady.title: Productivity Increase
fullStackReady.description: By providing a standardized, high-quality foundation, we eliminate the root causes of technical debt and context switching.

enterpriseGrade.title: Production-Ready
enterpriseGrade.description: Start with a project that's engineered for growth, reducing the risk of costly refactoring later.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to transform your vision into production-ready code

describe.title: Choose Your Blueprint
describe.description: Select from battle-tested blueprints or create your own. Each blueprint is a proven architecture pattern.
describe.codeExample:
# Available blueprints:
npx @architech/cli list

# Choose a blueprint:
npx @architech/cli create react-saas
# or
npx @architech/cli create nextjs-ecommerce
# or
npx @architech/cli create nodejs-api

generate.title: CLI Generates Your Project
generate.description: The CLI transforms your blueprint into a complete, production-ready codebase with all dependencies configured.
generate.codeExample:
# CLI generates your project:
npx @architech/cli create react-saas my-app

# Output:
✓ Created project structure
✓ Installed dependencies
✓ Configured TypeScript
✓ Set up TailwindCSS
✓ Added ESLint & Prettier
✓ Ready to develop!

deploy.title: Own Your Code, Instantly
deploy.description: Get production-ready code you fully own. No proprietary dependencies, no lock-in. Ever.

dialogue.excellentRequirements: Excellent requirements. I've designed a robust architecture optimized for enterprise-scale performance, security, and maintainability.
dialogue.architectureValidated: Architecture validated. Now orchestrating enterprise-grade components with precision engineering and seamless integration.
dialogue.missionAccomplished: Mission accomplished. Your enterprise-grade architecture is complete with full source code ownership, comprehensive documentation, and deployment-ready infrastructure.

liveDemo.subtitle: From idea to production-ready app in minutes. Watch as specialized AI agents collaborate to build your entire application.

ecosystem.title: A living ecosystem for developers
ecosystem.subtitle: Beyond the Templates: Your Vision, Your Stack.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Every module is defined by a simple file describing actions: create a file, run a command, add a dependency, etc... It's transparent, easy to debug, and simple to create your own.

blueprint.title: Simple Blueprint File
blueprint.code:
# Blueprint: Authentication Module
version: "1.0"
actions:
  - create_file: "auth.js"
  - run_command: "npm install bcrypt"
  - add_dependency: "express-session"

vision.description: We're building a community marketplace where developers can share pre-built integrations and modules. For unique needs, our AI will generate custom integrations automatically.

frontend.title: Modern Frontend
frontend.description: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and responsive design

backend.title: Robust Backend
backend.description: Node.js, Express, JWT authentication, and RESTful APIs

database.title: Database Integration
database.description: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or your preferred database solution

deployment.title: One-Click Deployment
deployment.description: Automatic deployment to Vercel, AWS, or your preferred platform

monitoring.title: Built-in Monitoring
monitoring.description: Real-time analytics, error tracking, and performance monitoring

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: JWT authentication, data encryption, and security best practices

whereWeFit.subtitle: A New Class of Tool. How The Architech combines the best of every world, without the compromises.

faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about The Architech and how it will transform your development workflow.

whatIsArchitech.question: What is Architech?
whatIsArchitech.answer: Architech is an AI-powered platform that generates complete, production-ready applications from simple text descriptions. It creates full-stack applications with frontend, backend, database, authentication, and deployment configuration.

howDoesItWork.question: How does it work?
howDoesItWork.answer: Simply describe your app idea in plain English, and our AI analyzes your requirements to generate a complete application with all necessary components, following industry best practices and security standards.

whatTechnologies.question: What technologies does it support?
whatTechnologies.answer: Architech supports modern tech stacks including React, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and can deploy to platforms like Vercel, AWS, and more.

isItSecure.question: Is the generated code secure?
isItSecure.answer: Yes, all generated applications follow security best practices including JWT authentication, data encryption, input validation, and protection against common vulnerabilities.

canICustomize.question: Can I customize the generated code?
canICustomize.answer: Absolutely! The generated code is fully customizable. You can modify, extend, or refactor any part of the application to meet your specific requirements.

pricing.question: What's the pricing?
pricing.answer: We offer flexible pricing plans for individuals, teams, and enterprises. Contact us to learn more about our pricing options and find the plan that works for you.

cta.subtitle: Join the waitlist and be among the first to experience the future of development.
cta.communityText: Join our community for early access & updates
cta.noSpamText: No spam, ever. Just updates on the revolution.

footer.description: Liberating developers from configuration hell, one modular architecture at a time. Build the magic, skip the setup.
footer.copyright: © 2025 The Architech. All rights reserved. Building the future of development.

team.subtitle: The Architech is born from real frustration with the current state of development tooling. We're building the platform we wish we had.

story.title: From the Founder
story.paragraph1: After nearly a decade building software and 3 years as CTO across multiple startups, I've watched brilliant ideas die not from lack of vision, but from configuration hell.
story.paragraph2: I've seen teams spend 70% of their time on setup, authentication, deployment pipelines, and database schemas instead of building what makes their product unique. The same solutions, built over and over, with the same bugs, the same security vulnerabilities.
story.paragraph3: The Architech was born from frustration. Why should every developer rebuild authentication? Why should every startup waste months on DevOps? Why isn't there a better way?
story.paragraph4: This isn't just another tool - it's a revolution against complexity. I'm building the platform I wish I had when I was drowning in configuration files at 2 AM, dreaming of focusing on the magic instead of the plumbing.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To give every developer superpowers. To eliminate the tedious setup work that prevents us from building amazing things. To democratize enterprise-grade architecture and make it accessible to everyone.
mission.tagline: Building the future, one module at a time

platformVision.subtitle: From code assembly to complete development ecosystem. Here's how The Architech evolves into the only platform you'll ever need—each milestone building upon the last.

designToCode.title: Design-to-Code
designToCode.description: Design your interfaces in a visual tool (integrating Penpot's open source technology) and instantly transform them into a library of reusable components.

cmsI18n.title: Integrated CMS & i18n
cmsI18n.description: Manage your application content and translations directly from the platform, with one click.

devopsAnalytics.title: Automated DevOps & Analytics
devopsAnalytics.description: From one-click deployment on European clouds to performance and user behavior monitoring, everything is integrated.

aiProjectManagement.title: AI-Powered Project Management
aiProjectManagement.description: Connect your feature requests directly to AI agents for ultra-fast development cycles.

useCases.subtitle: Build Anything. Faster. Better.

aiWriting.title: AI Writing Assistant
aiWriting.description: Intelligent content generation platform with OpenAI integration, vector search, and subscription management.

ecommerce.title: Modern E-commerce
ecommerce.description: Complete e-commerce blueprint with Stripe payments, inventory management, and admin dashboard.

dashboard.title: Internal Dashboard
dashboard.description: Analytics dashboard blueprint with charts, user management, and real-time data visualization.

whiteboard.title: Team Whiteboard
whiteboard.description: Real-time collaborative workspace blueprint with WebSocket integration and user presence.
